system.description:
You have been trained in the ways of both stealthy violence and athletic perfection, honing you into a lethal instrument of incredibly precise violence. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Sabers, Dueling Daggers, Hand Crossbows, Rapiers, and Shortbows are Adept weapons for you.
  • You can use Sneak Attack with unarmed attacks and adept weapons.
  • You gain proficiency with an additional combat tradition from the adept or rogue list.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in Adept, 3 levels in Rogue
